hero.HEADLINE: Authenticity, nostalgia, and fun in every game. Level up your collection!

about.TITLE: About Level Up
about.INTRO: Welcome to Level Up, your online store specializing in vintage arcade video game cartridges. We're passionate about gaming nostalgia and believe the classics never die. Here you'll find a curated selection of original cartridges, from iconic 80s and 90s titles to rare gems that defined an era.
about.ARCADE_MAGIC_TITLE: Relive the Magic of the Arcade
about.ARCADE_MAGIC_TEXT: Arcade video games were not only the beginning of the industry but also defined entire generations. At Level Up, we want you to enjoy those retro gems once again, whether you're collecting them or playing on original hardware.
about.WHAT_WE_OFFER_2: Rare and limited editions that are hard to find.
about.WHAT_WE_OFFER_3: Accessories and manuals to complete your collection.
about.WHAT_WE_OFFER_4: Personalized assistance to help you find the game you're looking for.
about.FOR_GAMERS_TEXT: Whether you're a collector searching for a unique piece or a gamer looking to relive your childhood, Level Up is the perfect place for you. We work with carefully inspected products to ensure the best quality and authenticity.
about.WORLDWIDE_SHIPPING_TEXT: Are you looking for that cartridge that marked your childhood? We'll ship it wherever you are so you can enjoy it again.
